beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* exposes a servlet that clients can send data to * writes data to stdout
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of exposing an adaptor as a servlet, typically you want to do this to allow a non java application use openadaptor functionality.
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config servlet.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
Once it is running you can test it using a web browser, like this...
http://localhost:9999/?data=foobar
